amendment.description: Amendment allows Partnership Grants to be used to establish teacher mentoring programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 108-190 to provide for `Mentoring Programs' under allowable uses for Partnership Grants under section 203. Such programs would: establish and implement minimum qualifications for mentors; provide training and stipends for mentors; provide mentoring programs for teachers in their first three years of teaching; provide regular and ongoing opportunities for mentors and mentees to observe each other's teaching methods in classroom settings during the school day; establish an evaluation and accountability plan for activities; require a report to the Secretary on an annual basis regarding the partnership's progress.
